subject: RE: The goals of CMM (Re: [junit] wanted Junit professionals urgently)
msgSnippet: ... You all may want to take this topic to the [software-testing] group. There you will find practitioners, authors and academics who absolutely live to debate
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]

>
> > Listers please excuse the off topic nature.

You all may want to take this topic to the [software-testing] group.
There you will find practitioners, authors and academics who absolutely
live to debate this exact stuff. Since I follow both groups, it doesn't
really matter much to me but I though you'd like to know.
